conversation.text: Based on the user's preference for post-apocalyptic stories and plots involving strong, morally complex characters facing adversity, I would recommend either "The Passage" or "Elizabeth". "The Passage" is a gripping post-apocalyptic film about a Basque shepherd leading a family across dangerous terrain to safety, while "Elizabeth" focuses on the early life of Elizabeth I of England and her struggle to learn the role of a queen.
